scripts.dev: concurrently -n main,renderer,preload,render-host,electron -c blue,green,magenta,yellow,cyan "bun run --filter @app/main dev" "bun run --filter @app/renderer dev" "bun run --filter @app/preload dev" "bunx esbuild packages/renderer/render-host-script.tsx --bundle --platform=browser --format=esm --outfile=render-host-script.js --watch" "bunx electron packages/main/dist"
scripts.build: bun run build:render-host && cp render-host.html render-host-script.js packages/main/dist/ && bun run --filter @app/* build
scripts.start: bun run build && bunx electron packages/main/dist
scripts.clean: bunx rimraf packages/*/dist release render-host-script.js render-host.html
scripts.clean:deep: bunx rimraf node_modules bun.lockb && bun install
scripts.postinstall: if [ "$CI" = "true" ]; then bunx electron-rebuild -w webrtcvad -f; fi
